title: Understanding Convergence Behavior in Implicit CFD Solvers
summary: Analysis of convergence behavior in implicit CFD solvers, covering CFL conditions, linear solver coupling, and practical convergence criteria for engineering applications.

title: Preconditioning Strategies for CFD Sparse Linear Systems
summary: Discussion of preconditioning techniques for large sparse systems in implicit CFD solvers, with focus on AMG and domain-specific strategies.

title: Practical Analysis of Parallel Scaling in CFD Applications
summary: Practical guidelines for analyzing and improving parallel scaling efficiency in large-scale CFD simulations.
